field.label: Name
field.help: Select a name for this match.

field.label: Description
field.help: Enter a description for this rule. The description should help you to identify this rule.

field.label: Negate
field.help: Negate this match. For example you can match if a host is not inside a network.

field.label: Match Type
field.help: Select the type of the match. Depending on the match, you will need different arguments.

field.label: Network
field.help: Enter the network address to match in CIDR notation for example like 127.0.0.1/8 or ::1/128

field.label: URL Pattern
field.help: Enter a URL pattern like forum.opnsense.org/index*.

field.label: Domain Level From
field.help: Enter the minimum amount of dots in the domain name.

field.label: Domain Level To
field.help: Enter the maximum amount of dots in the domain name.

field.label: Last Hour
field.help: Enter the end time (maximum 23, minimum 0 or start time).

field.label: To Month
field.help: Enter the last month (maximum December, minimum January or From Month).

field.label: From Day
field.help: Enter the first day of the week.

field.label: To Day
field.help: Enter the last day of the week.
